title.rendered: 2019 Copa America Finals Travel Package Rates

content.rendered:
2019 Copa America Rates

The rates below are based on a package with first class accommodations, airport transfers, and a complete match day experience to the 2019 Copa America. However, our specialty is bespoke travel packages tailored to fit you perfectly. To customize the Copa America trip of a lifetime, please contact one of our sports travel specialists at 1-800-465-1765 (weekdays between 8:30 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. CST). Or, fill out the information we need to build your custom trip request and one of our sports travel specialists will contact you.

2019 Copa America Finals Rates

4-Night Hotel PackageRoom CategoryPackages From
Copacabana PalaceSuperior Partial Ocean View$2,625
Copacabana PalaceOne Bedroom Suite w Pool View $3,275
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 25% deposit will hold your spot. The balance will not be due until May 1, 2019. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.

2019 Copa America Semi-Final Belo Rates

3-Night Hotel PackageRoom CategoryPackages From
Hotel Fasano Belo Horizonte Superior Room $1,645
Hotel Fasano Belo Horizonte Junior Suite $1,895
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 25% deposit will hold your spot. The balance will not be due until May 1, 2019. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.

2019 Copa America Semi+Final Rates

7-Night Hotel PackageRoom CategoryPackages From
Fasano Belo Horizonte + Copacabana Palace Superior Room (Partial Ocean View in Rio) $4,745
Fasano Belo Horizonte + Copacabana Palace Junior Suite (BH) + 1BR Suite (Rio) $5,655
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 25% deposit will hold your spot. The balance will not be due until May 1, 2019. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
